BARS 2018

Hauck Auditorium, David and Joan Traitel Building, Hoover Institution, Stanford, CA, 94305

Friday November 9, 2018

9:00AM - 5:00PM

The 2018 Bay Area Robotics Symposium aims to bring together roboticists from the Bay Area. The program will consist of a mix of faculty, student and industry presentations. For more details see the event schedule.
This year’s Bay Area Robotics Symposium will feature an opportunity for industrial researchers to present their work. See Call for Abstracts for more details.
We will be live-streaming the event. Streaming information will be made available the day before the event on Twitter.
The program will feature:
  • Presentations from Stanford and Berkeley faculty
  • Talks from bay area industry representatives
  • Keynote talks by Christopher Manning and Justice Cuéllar
  • Student poster sessions
Organizers: Marco Pavone (Chair), Anca Dragan (Co-Chair), Dorsa Sadigh, Mark Mueller
Local arrangements: Joseph Lorenzetti and Erdem Biyik
If you are interested in sponsoring this event, please contact the Symposium Co-organizer, Marco Pavone.
